name: AvocadOS
body:
### What AvocadOS?

Avacad**os**, stylized as **AvocadOS**, is a minimal operating system designed to run almost pure jQuery.

### The name?

The name, formerly **jQueryOS**, originates from a [meme][meme] on [Programming Puzzles & Code Golf][codegolf]

> i sad i try for thirry minut and no juic for avocad still no work

### Goals of AvocadOS

AvocadOS is really great and does all things.

 - jquery is the best quality code ever. If you don't use your an idiot
 - only jquery, otherwise not enough jQuery!
 - jQuery is definately the way to go

  [meme]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Meme
  [codegolf]: http://codegolf.stackexchange.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
